cause.description:
Since ive promised mr jake gyllenstierna to dress up as a potent superhero ive bought a children sized (between 6-8 year old) spiderman costume!!ive spared on the chocolate all winter to slim into the bloody polyester shit look alike gown...so plezze let me look rediculous for the DC10 CROUD!!
1. spiderman has to climb to the top of the world!!
2. spiderman could fly..to the top of the world
3. spiderman has made a promised to danze in tranzzz!!
cause.name: Spiderman likes to climb walls
